traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the rothe moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The deep rothe's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast dancing lights at will, requiring no components.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.
